snippet: Pitcher Wade Davis made a wild flip home on a comebacker in the eighth inning and the Minnesota Twins rallied past the Kansas City Royals 4-3 Sunday for a three-game sweep....

headline.print_headline: Davis' Throwing Error Sends Twins Over Royals
headline.main: Davis' Throwing Error Sends Twins Over Royals

lead_paragraph: Pitcher Wade Davis made a wild flip home on a comebacker in the eighth inning and the Minnesota Twins rallied past the Kansas City Royals 4-3 Sunday for a three-game sweep.
